item.title: Third-Year Review
item.description: Following the example of my friend Josh Rosenberg, here I am sharing the narrative I wrote for my third-year review this month.

item.title: Career Reflection
item.description: Iâ€™ve applied for a handful of academic jobs in the past six months, as many tenure track faculty positions as I could imagine fitting my experiences and skills.
